title: Buzdar wishes BoP president ‘good health’
content:
LAHORE, May 23 (APP):Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar on Saturday inquired after the Bank
of Punjab (BoP) President Zafar Masud on telephone, who miraculously survived
in yesterday’s PIA passenger plane crash in Karachi.
According to official sources here, CM prayed for the early recovery of Zafar Masud.
